website_summaries.verdict: Digital Tiny Traveler offers a clear view of your young one in the back of the car under all lighting conditions, but this system is best-suited for parents of infants under one year of age.
pros: The Digital Tiny Traveler system shows clear video imagery in low-light conditions and handles the transition from dark to light very well
The kit provides a number of mounting options for the camera
cons: The system requires two 12-volt power points in a car, and the long power cables can be challenging to set up

customer_reviews.title: Great car monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! With state law requiring babies to stay rear facing until at least age 2, and the infant seat behind the drivers seat to have my older child behind the passenger seat, I could not see the baby well even using a mirror system. This camera is great for quickly glancing and seeing that she's awake or see her "startle" while sleeping to know she's ok back there. Only complaint is that sometimes the way the sunlight comes into the car the camera switches between regular and night vision repeatedly. We are going to add tint to the back windows to help keep the sunlight impact at a minimum. Overall great system!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Poor video quality
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to receive and install our video monitor to watch our rear-facing infant, ditching the mirror for technology. Sadly, we were extremely disappointed in the video quality of this camera/monitor setup. You can't tell if your baby is awake asleep or breathing based off the images, we tried it both day and night and were very unimpressed. At this price point ($130) this should be crystal clear video, not grainy and poor quality. If you do purchase this, I highly recommend plugging it in and testing it out before you go to the trouble of running wires and installing mounts. 2 stars because it does provide video, just not well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: PEACE OF MIND
customer_reviews.text: my son was born 6 weeks early and I was a nervous wreck with leaving him alone in backseat being so small and premature, this has provided me with peace of mind and I love seeing that he is okay. It is hard for me to reach him and there isn't anywhere to pull over on my commute to check him so I am in love with this item, I have told a lot of moms-to-be about it and they are planning on getting it as well!
customer_reviews.author: ketchumsgal

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I had an earlier model that held up about 4 years before the screen just stopped working. I tried replacing it with this one and it won't turn on at all. Besides that, the cords are a pain since you have to use two 'lighter' outlets (Seriously, no usb option?! Even the older model had this) and the camera does not attach securely to the straps. It would get bumped constantly with kids getting in and out. I'll be returning it and trying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Just wOnderful

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Comes with plenty of hardware to mount it nearly wherever and however you like. It gives me a huge peace of mind and is far safer to glance at the screen than taking my eyes off the road to look at a mirror in a mirror. Installed in just a few minutes. Didn't have the plug problem, mostly because the wife's car is new enough to shut off the outlets when the car is turned off (2013 Chevy Cruze). For older vehicles I'd recommend a multi-plug outlet with a switch so you won't have to remove the plugs or risk draining the battery. Looking at buying another one for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a higher rating because the picture is good - especially at night. But, the charger on the camera broke after using it for 1 month and I can't get the manufacturer to respond to my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chris113

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! I have terrible anxiety and with my oldest I didn’t go anywhere driving for the first 9 months because I was dealing with the stupid mirrors. I just had my second child and this camera is a MAJOR GAME CHANGER! It’s perfect, I can see everything. There is a minimal delay when going from light to dark. I just wish once it was charged I could unplug it instead of having a cord out.
customer_reviews.author: Lorianne

customer_reviews.title: One of our best purchases
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy we purchased this. It was sometimes hard to see our son in the mirror that we had in the back seat and a friend recommended this. We purchased it the next day and it was one of the best purchases we have invested in. We can see him so much better now. The picture is very clear and the night vision is also very clear, which impressed us. It is not wireless as advertised, but that doesn't bother us.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product, Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has been life changing for this baby, it brings me so much peace to be able to see every move my baby makes behind me while she is rear facing. I wish I had had it years ago with my other child. Customer service through the warranty/parent company (winplususa) is A+ also! Had a slight issue 9 months after purchase and they completely handled it efficiently and amazingly. 5 stars all around for an amazing product and customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Camera does not work well when the weather starts to turn cold!!
customer_reviews.text: Picture is good enough. Sometimes struggles with determining whether or not to be in night vision. Biggest complaint is that the camera has a warmup time!? It worked fine during the summer, but as soon as the weather started to get colder, the camera now takes up to 10 minutes for it to warm up and turn on! Most of our drives are over by then! Also, not sure why they call this wireless. It has a wire on each part (monitor and camera) and requires cigarette lighter ports for each camera at all times! Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: New Momma's this is a MUST have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase for my baby. I didn't like the mirror. I love this it makes me feel that my baby is so safe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good option, much better than mirror
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and really like it. It works so much better than a baby mirror. You can mount it where it is easy to see and the night vision works well. Cons- power plugs do not seem well built, need two power plug ins. No shut off at the power plug like a competitor has.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Best baby product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is getting ready to turn 4 and we just switched her to front-facing and got rid of this camera. We've used it since she was a couple of weeks old so as you can tell we've put it through its paces. It just works, night or day, easy to see my child and ensure she's safe while a baby and then interact with her when she was older. 100% worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lenz

customer_reviews.title: Best baby gift ever
customer_reviews.text: As a mom that worries a lot having this has been AMAZING!!!! I love it and don't have to try to keep looking up in the mirror to see my child. Especially when it comes to driving at night it would be so hard to see him and this has been the best thing ever. I would recommend this for all mother's new and of multiples.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Good for two months, then it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great... for two months. Then it didnt. After two months camera would randomly stop transmitting to screen. I first thougt it was overheating because it sat in a car. After a couple weeks of intermittent functioining, it just doesnt work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: As a first time mom I am very pleased with this purchase and def recommend. It eases me knowing that I can see my baby when driving. I tried the backseat mirror but that didn't work for me. So glad I purchased this camera. The quality, both day and night is really good.
customer_reviews.author: daisy p.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and used per manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Love the monitor - but it was used not new - talked to the manufacturer and they informed me this was a returned unit. The pieces were missing and you could not use the suction cups or mounting brackets .....so upset
customer_reviews.author: Momma Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: The image is flipped. The display unit, camera, and mounts don't seem to work well together. You're better off repurposing a Garmin Dash CamTM Mini and connecting to it via Wifi From your phone to get a better image quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This item has been great for any time I have my son in the car. I can watch him day or night without having to take my eyes of the road longer than a quick glance. After 3 years of using the monitor, the suction cup that holds the camera onto the window began to lose suction. I contacted Yada and they are sending a replacement free of charge within the week. This excellent customer service is what has prompted me to write this review, so more parents can be aware of how this company treats their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin L.

customer_reviews.title: Great, but doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but this is the 2nd time I have purchased this model and both times, the camera has failed within 6 months. The first time was my fault, the cord got stuck in between the seat and was pulled apart and there is no way to repair it. But this time, for no reason it stopped working. At a $130 a pop, its way to expensive to keep buying when it just keeps breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie m

customer_reviews.title: Love it at first... but...
customer_reviews.text: Originally loved the product, couldn’t find anything else like it on the market. The biggest downside is that there is no off switch on the camera so you need to unplug it to prevent the car battery from dying. Less than a month of using it the piece you plug in started to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, junk product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great idea for rear-facing children, much easier and more consistent than messing with a mirror, especially in the dark. Unfortunately the product quality is terrible. Both plugs, the one for the camera as well as the one for the monitor disintegrated on me in less than six months. I attempted to reach out to the manufacturer multiple times with no response.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Maybe mine was a dud?
customer_reviews.text: The product seems pretty good except for the fact that not very long after I bought it the front piece came off from the back piece and I have had to hold it up with masking tape. And the division no longer works only the night vision.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Buy a back up cigarette adapter
customer_reviews.text: The cigarette adapter broke shortly after when just pulling it out to install in a different car. They don’t sell extras and I can’t figure out how to contact the seller to get a new adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Functional, great alternative to the backseat mirror system
customer_reviews.text: By far one of the best purchases we made for our baby. The backseat mirror system really was hard for me to use. If the baby wasn't in the car, I'd see the reflection of the oncoming traffic and it really freaked me out. This provides a nice tight shot of your baby in his/her carrier on a GPS-like mounted screen. There are several adjustments you can make to the color / brightness, etc, giving you a good clear shot. The night vision is also great. Overall, very functional and useful. We recommend it to everyone we know who has children. Completely worth the adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: AmyP78

customer_reviews.title: Worked for two months 😑
customer_reviews.text: We got this and for two months it would to great but the screen went black. Before it went black the screen would flicker. Unfortunately this was only we could find.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chun

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: This item stopped working after two weeks of using it for no reason at all. I just ended up ordering a normal baby monitor and made sure that it it has usb charging ports and that works a lot better than this cheap quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget for a 1st time mom!
customer_reviews.text: Best gadget I have ever purchased for my baby. This little camera gave me all the confidence and peace of mind I needed to drive around with my baby. As a first time mom, driving around with your new born facing backwards and not be able to see them, can be very overwhelming, (the whole idea of driving around with an infant is overwhelming). Having this camera and being able to see my baby at all times, gave me all the peace of mind I needed to take my baby around and not be anxious or wonder if she was ok. I just wish the baby was able to see me as well, butoverall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD I BOUGHT TWO!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I have had it for about a year now. I love it. The night vision is especially helpful. Best baby purchase. There are others referring to the the power plug breaking. I’ve never had that problem.
customer_reviews.author: TheGalvans

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this camera! I love that I can see my baby without having to find him in my rearview mirror. Everyone who gets in my car loves it too! I've only been using it for 2 months but it has been absolutely great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you want to use it more than 5 months
customer_reviews.text: This camera was great... until it wasn’t. It worked fine for the first 5 months I had it and then all the sudden the camera stopped working. My husband checked and the plug for the camera basically broke into 10 pieces with zero trauma to it. My husband rewired a new plug and it worked for all of 3 days. Now the camera turns on and off when it was to. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why watch the road when you can watch your baby?
customer_reviews.text: Great device, little bit pricey and the double lighter feeds can be problematic if you have an older vehicle. Also my wife tends to watch the baby more than the road now. However, this thing is 100 times better than a mirror system and it does exactly what it says it will. If you absolutely need to watch your baby at all times in a rear facing chair, this is the system for you.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: Camera installation was not difficult. Instructions need to be improved and had to search for installation videos. Connected up and video is really clear.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Watts

customer_reviews.title: Great, but had to order replacement part
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for his truck and I liked it so much I bought one too. The only reason I gave it four stars is because my husband's camera stopped working after about a month, so we emailed them all the information and hopefully will be getting a replacement soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kb

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: worked great on a recent road trip. I was able to see every little movement clearly even at night. monitor is not too big to be distracting, but large enough to see clearly. set up was super simple and took about 5 minutes max.
customer_reviews.author: t ski

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I can see my baby during the day clearly and at night/dusk. I cannot tell you how many mirrors I went through before I found this gem. It took a little bit to fit it perfectly where I wanted it but install was very easy. I wish there was a zoom feature or an easy way to dim at night but other than that I am happy with the purchase of this product and have already recommended it to a friend of mine who just had a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Night vision is great
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these for two cars. We’ve had the first one for well over two or so years without any issues. Only thing I wish was that it had an option to pan to more than one kid, the company said though you have to buy two units. It’s great to use for every day use to long car trips. It’s also a good way to visually see the car seat if say you were worried about leaving a kid in a hot car.
customer_reviews.author: Katie T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome for watching an infant in your car. You do not have to take your eyes off the road to turn and look back or to look in your rearview mirror to see what is going on. Bought another for a shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a baby gift. She loves it! The price is so worth it. Good quality and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Oma

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected quality of the screen/image sucks can zoom in and had two order 3 before getting one that actual worked.
customer_reviews.author: ambernicole

customer_reviews.title: It's so much better and safer than a backseat mirror since you don't ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this with my first child. My only complaint is that sometimes the image goes in and out. Regardless, I would buy it again. I can see my baby clearly, day or night. It's so much better and safer than a backseat mirror since you don't have to try hard to look in the rear view mirror to then find the reflection on the backseat mirror which usually doesn't provide a great angle to see the baby anyway. Backseat mirrors don't allow you to see the baby when it's dark either. I'm glad I stumbled upon this.
customer_reviews.author: Sandralis

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to see my newborn. Makes driving and knowing they are okay less stressful. Worth the $100 < price
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok but I’m not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’m not impressed. Was a pain to mount, doesn’t stay on the mount well. The picture quality is not the best, very grainy and washed out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't zoom in
customer_reviews.text: It would be great if you could zoom in and out. The window suction cup sucks and where the cam attaches to also,it just rests on it does not click. the suction cup falls off window constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Carbon6smami

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!!!!! I never thought about this type of thing existing. I would find myself before constantly checking the mirror to see what my baby was doing. Now my eyes can stay right on the road and glance at this screen. It feels much more safe to me! And this is so perfect for road trips! We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lenae Rickett

customer_reviews.title: Every parent should have one!
customer_reviews.text: We have this for our older son who is two and still rear facing. We bought another for baby brother. This is literally one of our most useful baby purchases. We love being able to see him, even at night.
customer_reviews.author: Emily K.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE watching the baby on it.
customer_reviews.text: We frickin LOVE this product, but 4 stars because 1) The monitor shows a mirror image of the baby and 2) We had to buy an adaptor to plug in the camera. Been using it for 6mo and love it other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after only 2 months - bad!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this item for 2 months and it worked great until it stopped working yesterday for no apparent reason. The screen is now black and no longer displays anything. Proceeded with suggested steps as per guide to no avail. VERY disappointed with the extreme short life span.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Great baby camera for the car
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to see my baby even at night. Wish this could be taken into the stroller too.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I am

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: It's a must have, specially when I'm driving all by myself. I'm able see the little one without having to turn back and look at the mirror. Even though it does require 2 plugs, the cables are long enough to reach them over where ever they are placed in your car.
customer_reviews.author: gb

customer_reviews.title: So happy I found this.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. One of the best things I have bought baby related. I love having the ability to see my baby completely while I’m driving. Only took a star off because the quality could be a little better but it’s still pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Catalystcat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, must have for nervousness nellies.
customer_reviews.text: I started out with the mirror in the back seat but this blows them away. It's great to be able to see my baby without having to look in the rear view mirror. This mounts on your windshield like a GPS would. I had an issue with a broken cord after I first bought this. I called up Yada customer service and they were awesome. They shipped me a new one out at no cost. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Swayze

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this for first child
customer_reviews.text: Did a two week road trip across country with a newborn (6 was) and this gave use so much peace of mind while we journeyed to our new home. A little complicated with the cords but if you have a newer model car with multiple power jacks you can make it work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. It gives me peace of mind driving since I can easily see what my baby is doing. It’s also amazing for driving during the night. You can still see your child unlike the regular mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Video quality is poor but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Video quality is very poor. It works for what it's for but it's rough. The monitor is low resolution and the color is practically non existent. It will do the job but leaves a lot to be desired. The selection of mounting equipment is nice. The cable on the camera is very long which is great but the cable for the monitor power cable is much shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael kulmatycski

customer_reviews.title: the BEST thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I would 100% recommend this to any new moms. it makes me feel so relieved to be able to see my son so clearly. It was totally worth the money! i will recommend this 100 times over.
customer_reviews.author: Baleigh Brown

customer_reviews.title: Did not operate as designed.
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift for a baby shower on March 1st. when install was attempted on Mar 2nd, item did not work. on phone with company technical help and they said return the item. return window is closed, now what?
customer_reviews.author: yoakam56

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 5 star rating if it weren't for the fact that i have to constantly keep messing with the outlet so the screen horns back on
customer_reviews.author: ViaSummersEye

customer_reviews.title: Great camera great value
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Helps me have peace of mind when driving with baby and that is priceless! Only thing I'd change are the wires. Wish there was an affordable wireless solution. Love that I don't have to mount the monitor and can hide it when I'm not in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Sedona

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this camera! It has great picture quality and the connector cords are super long. I have a 3rd row SUV and the cords are plenty long enough with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Best And Safest Baby Monitor for the Car!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I feel so much better about driving with the baby and being able to see him. I dont have to worry about the mirror we had originally purchased to help keep an eye on him falling down or off. All I have to do is glance over to the screen and there he is. The only thing I wish this did was allow you to zoom in a little closer to the baby. I can see everything, including the back of my head in the driver seat the picture is out so far.
customer_reviews.author: APhillips0223

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these cameras and have purchased one as a gift. We have had an issue with one of the cameras but this company stands behind their product 100% The customer service has been outstanding as we are trying to figure out why one of the cameras is not working properly. This is such a useful tool especially when driving on the highways and at night as pulling over is not ideal. As far as safety the camera attaches snugly and securely to the headrest. our daughter will be rear facing for at least two years and having the camera will be very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: brian a. feeney

customer_reviews.title: It's awful
customer_reviews.text: It works for a few days. I actually already returned one and they sent me another one, however that one doesn't work. The screen turns off and on randomly, it's awful. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Solís

customer_reviews.title: Best baby product ever
customer_reviews.text: One of my top 5 gadgets to have! Makes night time traveling so much easier. Easy setup, only con is the blue power light-headed I covered it with a small piece of electrical tape
customer_reviews.author: mary h

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The camera would not stay on it would cut off while driving and blink and never come back on. Terrible black and white colors when it did come on. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Issy1967

customer_reviews.title: We loved it while it worked.
customer_reviews.text: We loved it for the few weeks that it worked. It stopped working shortly after our son was born. I called the customer service number and they are going to send a replacement. i received the replacement in less then a week. I hope this one lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is good but need to improve
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied. The quality of the image is awful, sometimes is gray and then in colors. I bought it because is the only one I found.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Jacob Face

customer_reviews.title: We installed it before the birth of our daughter and ...
customer_reviews.text: We installed it before the birth of our daughter and it died before she was born. They replaced it no questions asked, but then the replacement died within 2 1/2 months. They replaced it a third and final time, no questions asked. Our final replacement caught fire within seconds of plugging it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last 3 months and the screen already went out in it. Keep unplugging everything and nothing. The picture won't show up, but I'm able to change the brightness and all that. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Loooove! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Works well with great clear pic. My daughter is a preemie who suffers with reflux and low oxygen levels so I vlcan noe keep my eye on her. Better than those stupid mirrors that never stay in place. Worth the $$$. We live in Ga so I never leave the monitor in the car due to the heat
customer_reviews.author: Roger A.

customer_reviews.title: A necessity!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this item! It is my number one recommended necessity for new parents!!! I keep the monitor down by my gearshift however, because I found that it was too distracting having it in my line of sight while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Lee

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome. The down side for me is we are ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. The down side for me is we are having problems with it not working continuously on two of the three. Good customer service in the past. One was replaced without a problem. Have not sent notice of issues to company yet. This
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Rose 123

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor system
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the car. Works really well and was easy to install. The only issue that we had with it was that it would flash on and off when we first started using it... It does not do that any more. I would have had no problem giving it 5 stars if it auto dimmed the brightness at night and/or the button functions were easier to read from the front of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wyckoff

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth every penny spent on it. This is the coolest product ever!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS PERFECT FOR ANYONE THAT HAS A BABY. The picture is real clear. It was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! Wish i'd known about this product when my medically fragile child first came home! I can see her so much better with the monitor than thru the mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Garnet Morash

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted... Not very long.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in 3/17 and it quit working 5/17. It was awesome while it lasted, but it only lasted 2 months. The screen will no longer turn on and just goes 1/2 green. I also wish there weren't so many wires, but I could deal with that. I'm going to check on the manufacture's warranty to see if they will replace, but don't want to get my hopes up.
customer_reviews.author: marshawn morla

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I’ve literally bought it for two friends and my sister for their own babies since I love mine so much.
customer_reviews.author: L.K.P

customer_reviews.title: Best baby shower gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this, can’t have a baby without it.
customer_reviews.author: JustJennyq

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Original one didn't work had to go through manufactur.. To get it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Cortez

customer_reviews.title: This is a piece of mind and honestly the BEST GIFTI BOUGHT MYSELF for when in the car with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of mind and honestly the BEST GIFTI BOUGHT MYSELF for when in the car with my little guy! I recommend every mom should have this for their child. Works both during the day and at night. Only thing I recommend is removing when in heat for a while and storing in glovebox and alway unplug the cords when not in use! Other then that i would HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS ITEM!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: This camera works very well in my vehicle, to be able to have a visual on my baby who is in a rear facing car seat at all times is a blessing!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Vest

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever invented. Perfect to see your child and not have to strain from mirror to mirror
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No happy at all.
customer_reviews.text: Worked really good until I Unplugged it from the outlet in my car. When I unplugged it. The end fell apart and no longer works. Not happy. Only had it for 2 months. Waste of money😡
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. The picture is horrible and grainy. It is cheaply made and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: kyle baker

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product in June, does not work anymore. Turns on for about 5 seconds then turns back off
customer_reviews.author: Samantha bass

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. I bought it so I could watch my pugs in the back seat without turning around to watch them.
customer_reviews.author: teacher1230_1

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I was sceptical after reading other reviews. I am very careful when taking the plug out of the car but it has worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana H.

customer_reviews.title: I loved the idea of having a camera but too much ...
customer_reviews.text: This unfortunately broke during installation. I loved the idea of having a camera but too much fuss with all the wires running through my vehicle. It would not have worked for me even if it didn't break
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great. I would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: We use it to see our 5 dogs in the back of our van. It works great. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: It does the job it's supposed to. Colors aren't ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the job it's supposed to. Colors aren't really as vibrant as the picture shows, they're closer to looking black and white.
customer_reviews.author: Wael

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Gave me peace of mind on our long road trip!! Loved the night vision!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! Super clear image and pretty good night image. PEACE OF MIND! GREAT price.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: We love being able to watch the road and keep an ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both have one of these in our cars. We love being able to watch the road and keep an eye on our daughter through long drives.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better then trying to look in the mirror. My only complaint is the color is off when in bright light making it hard to see babies color.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Safe + night vision!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Way better than the mirror options. Can see baby well and safely.
customer_reviews.author: Allyssa Glatt

customer_reviews.title: Must have for first time parent
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Peace of mind. Wires aren't the prettiest but well worth it. If your babe has any type of illness, this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was alright but no option for additional camera if you have multiple kids
customer_reviews.author: Media Class

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: So much safer than using a mirror. I can always see my baby. It works exactly how I need it too!
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Creech

customer_reviews.title: Works great! We have had zero image quality issues with ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We have had zero image quality issues with our 2013 Durango Bluetooth. Quick, simple and easy setup too!
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Moser

Product Type: -Digital Monitors. Video: -Yes. Color: -Yes. Digital: -Yes. Generic Dimensions: -Overall 3" H x 13. 88" W x 8. 38" D, 1. 4 lbs. Dimensions: Overall Product Weight: -1. 4 Pounds. Operation range: 16 feet / 5 meter cable.
feature_bullets: Glance at your baby without having to turn around
See your baby clearly at night
Wireless camera comes with 2 options for the headrest mount and a suction cup mount for flexible placement
Camera needs 12V power and transmits wirelessly to the monitor
45 Degree Viewing Angle. VGA Image Quality
